issue.title: [Python] Support other interval types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14250](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14250). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13806 added support for month_day_nano_interval, but other interval types should also be supported in Python.
